questions.question: When is the hackathon?
questions.answer: The hackathon will take place from October 1st to October 17th.

questions.question: Hello
questions.answer: Hello, Good to have you here

questions.question: What is the location of the hackathon?
questions.answer: The hackathon will be held at flexera office

questions.question: How can I register for the hackathon?
questions.answer: You can register by visiting the 'Register' section on our website and filling out the registration form.

questions.question: What are the rules for the hackathon?
questions.answer: You can find the detailed rules and guidelines in the 'Rules' section on our website.

questions.question: What is the theme of the hackathon?
questions.answer: This year's theme is 'Sustainability and Innovation.'

questions.question: Who can participate in the hackathon?
questions.answer: The hackathon is open to Only flexera employees

questions.question: Are there any prizes for the winners?
questions.answer: Yes, we have exciting prizes including cash awards, gadgets, and internship opportunities.

questions.question: Can I participate as a solo participant?
questions.answer: Yes, you can participate individually or as part of a team.

questions.question: What is the maximum team size?
questions.answer: The maximum team size is 5 members.

questions.question: Will there be any workshops or talks?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a lineup of workshops and talks by industry experts. Check the 'Schedule' section for more details.

questions.question: What is the deadline for registration?
questions.answer: The registration deadline is august 30th.

questions.question: How can I submit my project idea?
questions.answer: You can submit your project through the 'Submission' portal on our website.

questions.question: Is there any participation fee?
questions.answer: No, participation is completely free.

questions.question: Will food and accommodation be provided?
questions.answer: Yes, we will provide meals and accommodation for all participants.

questions.question: How can I contact the organizers?
questions.answer: You can reach out to us via email at contact@hackathonwebsite.com.

questions.question: What is the judging criteria?
questions.answer: Projects will be judged based on innovation, impact, feasibility, and presentation.

questions.question: Can I use external APIs in my project?
questions.answer: Yes, you are allowed to use external APIs and libraries.

questions.question: Will there be any pre-hackathon events?
questions.answer: Yes, we have pre-hackathon webinars and networking events. Check the 'Events' section for more info.

questions.question: Do I need to bring my own laptop?
questions.answer: Yes, participants are required to bring their own laptops and necessary equipment.

questions.question: What should I do if I face technical issues during the hackathon?
questions.answer: You can contact our technical support team at techsupport@hackathonwebsite.com.

questions.question: This event is completely ridiculous!
questions.answer: Please refrain from using abusive language.
